MAZA Network

Geo Visualization - Sandy and Airports

KML Map, Fusion Grid displaying live data. Hurricane Sandy impact cone, world Airport locations, and busiest airports.

Filter


This app was created with “zero coding”. It is created simply from configuration, using live open data sources, and reusing plugins created for OpenTheme.
